data.name: Gun Raiders
data.description:
Gun Raiders is a free-to-play VR shooter! Chat with friends while mowing down enemies in multiple game modes while jetpacking through the air or climbing from wall to wall monkey-style! Race to the top of the leaderboards while customizing yourself with crazy meme skins in the Item Shop. Now with Battle Royale and Shurikens!

Play through 100 levels of loot in our newest Season 8: Shimmer Isle Battle Pass and earn up to 500 Raider Coins free. Join our Discord for tournament info, free Raider Coins, talk with the developers, hang with the community, or become a beta tester!

Battle Royale
Can you survive and outlive your opponents?  Test your worth in our newest and highly requested game mode.

Hub & Chill
For those looking for something slower pace, hang out in the hub with other players and make new friends.

Assault
Raid the enemy base and defend your own to score points for your team.

Control
Teams face off to capture and control the point in this fast-paced dogfight gameplay.

Free For All
The go-to arena mode for instant action and a great way to show off your skills.

Team Deathmatch
Less thinking and more action. The team with the highest points wins.
